abstract:
In MarkLogic 6, there is a powerful feature for transforming XML to and from JSON. In this talk I discuss various strategies for JSON transformation including some of the more advanced techniques that allow you to closely manage the generated JSON and XML. Examples include:

• Using XML schema to control JSON types 
• Features of the Custom strategy for precise transformation 
• Understanding the MarkLogic XML representation of JSON documents 
• Advanced techniques for achieving non-standard JSON such as needed for Google Visualization.
title: Advanced JSON Transformations
